author: smuzaffar
body:
Unit test `CondTools/CTPPS/test_XMLToSQLiteMapping` was modifying configuration files in the cmssw/src tree. This can fail if the package , whereit tries to modify files, exists on the read-only file system e.g. cvmfs. This happens during PR tests when package with unit test is checked but not the package which contains the files to be modifies ( see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43037#issuecomment-1780841332)

This PR makes a local copy of the test configuration
title: Fix unittest by making a local copy of test configuration
